text: "Stay" is a 2007 song by country band Sugarland and is the fourth and final single from their second studio album Enjoy the Ride. It went to number 32 in the United States, number 48 in Canada and made number 2 on both the country single charts in the United States and Canada. It won 2 Grammys in 2009. ==References== Category:2007 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Sugarland songs Category:Ronan Keating songs
title: Stay (Sugarland song)
